biotools.summary: Complex COMParison, is a simple command-line tool for comparing ligand/receptor complexes. It can also be used for calculating pairwise all-atom RMSD of slightly different protein structures, taking care of missing atoms, sequence inconsistencies, etc.

bioschemas.name: CCOMP
bioschemas.summary: Complex COMParison, is a simple command-line tool for comparing ligand/receptor complexes. It can also be used for calculating pairwise all-atom RMSD of slightly different protein structures, taking care of missing atoms, sequence inconsistencies, etc.
